subjects.name: Language A: Literature SL
subjects.description: The IB Language A: Literature course develops students' skills in textual analysis and critical interpretation, allowing them to engage with a range of literary works across cultures and forms. It emphasizes close reading and encourages learners to express their interpretations effectively in speech and writing.
learningObjectives: Perform detailed textual analysis of prose, poetry and drama
Explore cultural and historical contexts of literature
Compare and contrast literary works across time and space
Communicate critical interpretations orally and in writing

Identify and evaluate persuasive language and media techniques
